Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.interfaces

Interface PingPongCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentInterface, OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PingPongConnector, PingPongInboundPort, PingPongOutboundPort
    public interface PingPongCI
extends OfferedCI, RequiredCI
    The interface PingPongCI

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-03-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void goToService()
      initialise the component to start a new exchange.
      void hit​(Ball b)
      play the player hit and, if the exchange is not terminated, schedule a call to the method send to push the ball to the other player after waiting 100 milliseconds.
      void pingPong()
      service called by each player to send the control to the other player.
      void play()
      play the ball during the first exchange involving the offered and required interfaces as well as inbound and outbound ports.
      void playOnDataPull()
      pull the ball during the second exchange involving the data offered and data required interfaces as well as data inbound and data outbound ports.
      void playOnDataReception​(Ball b)
      play the ball during the second exchange involving the data offered and data required interfaces as well as data inbound and data outbound ports.
